title: How to Remove Fluorescent Glo Stick Liquid from Fabric

steps.headline: Put one cup of salt into a bucket of cold water.
Soak the clothing item in the saltwater for 20 - 30 minutes.
Remove the item and squeeze out the water.
Place in the freezer until frozen.
Wash as usual.
steps.description: Yes, wash a piece of frozen clothing! Wash it on its own. The liquid stain should come out.

text: Put one cup of salt into a bucket of cold water.  Soak the clothing item in the saltwater for 20 - 30 minutes.  Remove the item and squeeze out the water.  Place in the freezer until frozen.  Wash as usual. Yes, wash a piece of frozen clothing! Wash it on its own. The liquid stain should come out.
